column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////What a find! Visiting Houston for a weekend and found Bosscat on Yelp. Glad we did. Great venue with open sides
column2: brick and reclaimed wood. The whiskey selection is great. Almost hard to choose with so many rare/hard to find options. The food was fantastic
column3: focused on "comfort options" but not any one cuisine. We had a fantastic shrimp and grits with Crystal hot sauce and a braised short rib with potato.
